content: **knitted drops mittens in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ee-508 yarn group e or c + c ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m l/xl **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 100 g for all sizes in color no 53 light gray drops double pointed needles size 7 mm / us 10 75 - or size needed to get 12 sts x 16 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm / us 10 for rib
